actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-928.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of 15,000 copies of "Federal Election Campaign Laws Relating to the U.S. House of Representatives".

summary.text: Directs that the document, "Federal Election Campaign Laws Relating to the United States House of Representatives," be printed as a House document. Provides that 15,000 copies shall be printed, of which 5,000 shall be for the use of the Committee on House Adminstration of the House and the remaining 10,000 for distribution to candidates for the House of Representatives and for political committees supporting them.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of 15,000 copies of "Federal Election Campaign Laws Relating to the U.S. House of Representatives".
